mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.yabh yabh, t.yasxh yasxh, t.yabbh yabbh, t.yalxdm yalxdm, t.yamc yamc, t.yazt yazt, t.yajb yajb, t.dxid dxid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.bwid bwid, t.bwmc bwmc, t.sfkqy sfkqy, t.jgid jgid, t.jgbm jgbm, t.jgmc jgmc, t.zzrid zzrid, t.zzrmc zzrmc, TO_CHAR(t.zzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzsj, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_ZZDW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_ZZDW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZZDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALXDM = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZZDW(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalxdm,yamc,yazt,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yazt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_ZZDW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZZDW(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalxdm,yamc,yazt,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabh,#{item.yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yasxh,#{item.yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabbh,#{item.yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yalxdm,#{item.yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yamc,#{item.yazt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yazt,#{item.yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yajb,#{item.dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxid,#{item.dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxmc,#{item.bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwid,#{item.bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwmc,#{item.sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfkqy,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgbm,#{item.jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgmc,#{item.zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrid,#{item.zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrmc,#{item.zzsj,jdbcType=DATE} zzsj,#{item.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shzt,#{item.shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrid,#{item.shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrmc,#{item.shsj,jdbcType=DATE} shsj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yabh = VALUES(yabh), yasxh = VALUES(yasxh), yabbh = VALUES(yabbh), yalxdm = VALUES(yalxdm), yamc = VALUES(yamc), yazt = VALUES(yazt), yajb = VALUES(yajb), dxid = VALUES(dxid), dxmc = VALUES(dxmc), bwid = VALUES(bwid), bwmc = VALUES(bwmc), sfkqy = VALUES(sfkqy), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jgbm = VALUES(jgbm), jgmc = VALUES(jgmc), zzrid = VALUES(zzrid), zzrmc = VALUES(zzrmc), zzsj = VALUES(zzsj), shzt = VALUES(shzt), shrid = VALUES(shrid), shrmc = VALUES(shrmc), shsj = VALUES(shsj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_ZZDW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
SELECT t2.code_name FROM SYS_CODELIST t1,SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL t2 WHERE t1.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' AND t1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t1.CODEID = t2.CODEID AND t2.CODE_VALUE = #{VALUE}
